articles.title: Your Sâ€™pore Story: â€˜Response has always been positive until I posted my nasi lemak characterâ€™
articles.content: Find out whatâ€™s new on ST website and app. Artist Andy Choo brings local flavours to life with his illustrated cast of hawker-inspired heroes. The cheat code to going viral. According to a comment on Mr Andy Chooâ€™s artwork, it is making Malaysians angry. The origin of well-loved hawker dishes has long been a prickly subject between Singapore and Malaysia. Dozens of Malaysians flooded his page with comments, accusing him of claiming the national dish as Singaporean. Still, the nasi lemak debacle â€“ while unintended â€“ felt like a small win

articles.title: Astronomer executivesâ€™ Coldplay scandal: Why it went viral and the obsession with public shaming
articles.content: Find out whatâ€™s new on ST website and app. A tech CEO's alleged affair with his HR chief came to light during a Coldplay concert. they were featured on the kiss cam at a Coldplay concert in Boston. Their reaction was so suspicious that the bandâ€™s frontman Chris Martin quipped: â€œEither they are having an affair or theyâ€™re just very shy.â€. Internet sleuths uncovered their names and job titles â€“ heâ€™s Andy Byron the now-former chief executive at the company; sheâ€™s...

articles.title: JPMorgan raises STI target, upgrades real estate sector
articles.content: Analysts stress that the Singapore dollar is a safe-haven currency as the US dollar weakens. [SINGAPORE] Analysts from JPMorgan raised their target on the Straits Times Index (STI), with a higher base and bull target of 4,500 and 5,000, respectively. They also reiterated that Singaporeâ€™s equities market is their No 1 â€œoverweightâ€ market in South-east Asia. In the broader market, gainers outnumbered losers 254 to 226, with 1.2 billion securities valued at S$851 million changing hands
